titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on Baytron and Baytron P.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the article description of certain aqueous dispersions (Baytron and Baytron P) and to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on them.
